spagg

The goal of spagg is to provide tools for aggregating spatial summary statistics generated from multiple regions-of-interest (ROIs) imaged using spatial proteomics from the same tissue sample.

Installation

You can install the development version of spagg from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sarahsamorodnitsky/spagg")

Vignettes

For example usage of spagg in single-cell spatial proteomics imaging analysis, please see the associated vignettes.

Bugs and Improvements

Please feel free to notify me about issues or bugs in the package using the Issues tab. Feel free to use this tab to also suggest improvements to the package.
